entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
